caption.p:
Cyclic voltammetry of roughened gold electrodes (exchange disk electrodes) in (20 % O 2+80 % Ar)‐saturated 0.1 m Ca(ClO 4) 2 containing DMSO at 20 mV s −1, E ring=0.4 V and 4–16 Hz rotation frequency vs Ag/Ag + using a usual H‐cell. Disk current density is shown in (a), (d), and (g). The ring current (b,e,h) is normalized to the collection efficiency
N 0
and
A
g e o
d i s k
. The anodic signal is magnified in (c), (f), and (i), and the dashed grey line denotes 0 V.
